author: Steve Weeks
content:
We were in the San Diego, US area and I noticed a vandalized bike locked to a frame much like in this one.  My first thought was of you and your bicycle series so I made an image. http://www.flickr.com/photos/42171752@N05/4162811683/

I hadn't really thought of vandalism in the short term, however prevalent.  Sad commentary on people in general.

Steve
